# dnsSettings

**Instance Property**

An object that contains the configuration settings for a DNS server.

## Declaration

```swift
var dnsSettings: NEDNSSettings? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property can be set to either an [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEDNSOverHTTPSSettings] object or an [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEDNSOverTLSSettings] object.

## Accessing DNS configuration properties

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean you use to query the enabled state of the DNS settings configuration.
- **localizedDescription**: A string that contains the display name of the DNS settings configuration.
- **onDemandRules**: A list of ordered rules that defines the networks on which the DNS settings will apply.
